ygData.subject: Dueling on PS2
ygData.msgSnippet: You didn t get waxed by another player then.  If there is no PVP on the PS2 version then you got waxed by an NPC.  And assuming the PS2 version remains true to
ygData.messageBody:
You didn't get waxed by another player then.  If there is no PVP on the PS2 version then you got waxed by an NPC.  And assuming the PS2 version remains true to the computer game, Freeport initself is not an inherently evil town.  Freeport is just having internal problems.  The Freeport Militia in West Freeport are against the Knights Of Truth in North Freeport.  And quite frankly, neither group tolerates dark elves.  Dark elves who are allowed in Freeport have worked hard to make it so by killing off orcs and turning in belts and shoulder pads for faction.  If you're a low level dark elf then no amount of dueling would have saved you cause if anyone canc ome up and beat you down ont he spot like that, you couldn't beat them anyway.  So stick to Neriak until you raise your faction to at least apprehensive. Then go to Freeport.
 
Wulfric
 

----- Original Message -----
From: Jenn
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, April 18, 2003 11:18 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 739

Message: 7
   Date: Fri, 18 Apr 2003 13:21:25 -0000
   From: "karnisflamebird" <karnisflamebird@...>
Subject: R they eva gon put duleing on the PS2 version

i was this dark elf i couldent attack ne one but one of the white
elves walked up and droped me right there :\ oh i jus wanted to
dule him 2 the death :@



__Count Candrid

---------------------------------

Stay away from the Elf towns and you'll be ok.  EQOA has no plans to include PVP as far as I know. There are lots of places Dark Elves are welcome, have you been to Freeport yet?  That town is an evil town, still seems strange to see Trolls walking around Freeport.  Have fun.
